title: Configure visualization time range and refresh interval

blocks.content:
You can define the time span for which data is displayed in the visualization. For instance, if the current time is 1 PM and you set a time range of 1 hour, the visualization will show data from 12 PM to 1 PM.

Additionally, you can enable automatic data refresh. The refresh interval determines how frequently the data updates.

> **Tip:** Choose the slowest refresh interval that meets your requirements. Selecting a faster interval when data changes infrequently can degrade dashboard performance.
Click the **time picker** drop-down in the toolbar to select a time range for your visualization.
Select a time range from the available options (for example, **Last 1 hour**, **Last 6 hours**, or **Last 24 hours**).
Click the **refresh** drop-down icon to select how often the visualization data updates.

Select a refresh interval from the available options (for example, **1m**, **5m**, or **15m**).

You're now ready to save the dashboard so that other users can view it.
